= Introduction =

you can install Maegen from source or from an archive. The best way for a Maemo app would be from a repository... any volunteer ?


= From source =

checkout source from [http://code.google.com/p/maegen/source/checkout this page] then run as root from the root project tree
`python setup.py install`

= From archive =

This site host somme download but you can find them on [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/maegen pypi] page also.

== Source archive ==

Download the source tar.g and extract then process as for installation from source described above

== Egg archive ==

You need to have easy_install on the device.
Download the egg then run `easy_install -f <maegen_egg>`
